headline: 2 Top Artificial Intelligence Stocks to Buy in December
summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) continues to be one of the biggest driving forces in the stock market.  While chipmakers and cloud computing companies have been the biggest early beneficiaries, software companies are starting to see nice growth opportunities emerge as well.  Let's look at two semiconductor stocks that should see AI help power their growth in December and beyond.
